column5:
Have you looked at EPIK (English Programs In Korea)? Check it out, it might pique your interest.

I know where you're coming from, man. I'm right there with you.

Thanks for replying.

I'm going to graduate uni by the end of the month with a bachelor's. The issue is, this fellowship was what I was hoping would make my medical school app actually competitive...and now it's gone. Everyone seems genuinely surprised that I didn't get it. If I can't get something I'm qualified for, that doesn't bode well for me in the future.
